text: Whodini is an American hip hop group that was formed in 1982. It was founded in Brooklyn, New York-based trio. Members of the group were vocalist and main lyricist Jalil Hutchins; co-vocalist John Fletcher, a.k.a. Ecstasy (who wore a Zorro-style hat as his trademark); and turntable artist DJ Drew Carter, a.k.a. Grandmaster Dee. ==References== Category:1980s establishments in New York (state) Category:1982 establishments in the United States Category:American hip hop musicians Category:Musical groups established in 1982 Category:Musical groups from New York City
title: Whodini
